commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Sigh* Time really flies. It's already so late.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Which means, it's almost...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Should we head back soon?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Now, now, why don't we stay a little longer?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What's wrong?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Look up at the sky. Do you notice anything?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It looks the same as before.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Look very closely, Chika-chi. I think you'll see something.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Huh? Hmm...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Oh! What just streaked by?! A shooting star?!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Oh, there goes another one! Whoa! This is amazing!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: There's so many! Is this...?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: That's right. Today's the best day to see this meteor shower. Which is why... Look! You can see so many shooting stars!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Whoa! You're right! Over there, over here! *Laugh* I don't know where to look!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: So this is why you suggested going on a walk. You should have told us.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* I wanted to surprise you.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: But I did tell you that today would be a good day to make a wish.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: This is awesome, Nozomi. I'm so surprised. Whoa!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: The starry sky earlier was pretty, but this is even more incredible. It's like the night sky is a stage.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Seeing all of these shooting stars is such a moving experience.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: It's really beautiful and dreamy. I don't think I'll ever forget this sight.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* I'm glad you like it.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It's fun looking at the stars together! I'm so happy we came on this walk, that I invited you all to Uchiura!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I was able to show you lots of Uchiura's charm and noticed a lot of things I wouldn't have seen myself.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Thank you all so much for today!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* This is the best time of year to see a meteor shower.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: So we should be the ones thanking you for inviting us today. We have these wonderful new memories because of you, Chika-chi.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: R-Really? You're making me blush. Hehe.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Today turned out how it did because we were all here. That's what I believe.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Oh, why don't we make a wish while all of these shooting stars are falling?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Good idea. Hmm. How about wishing that we can make another wonderful memory together one day?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Yes. Next time, I hope we can enjoy it with the members who aren't here, too.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah! I want all of the μ's and Aqours and Nijigasaki members to hang out here again!
